description: Triangular array formed by taking every other term of Pascal's triangle.
links: D. Dumont and J. Zeng, Polynomes d'Euler et les fractions continues de Stieltjes-Rogers, Ramanujan J. 2 (1998) 3, 387-410.
formula: a(n) = A007318(2n) if both are regarded as integer sequences. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 11 2004
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if( k<0 || k>n\4 + (n+1)\4, 0, binomial(n, 2*k + (n+1)\2%2))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 11 2004 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
